item.ptxt: In case that DTC P0606 D6 can not be cleared according to this procedure, clear DTC by specified procedure described in DTC P0606: ECM Processor:F9Q .
Even if clear command is sent to ECM, current DTC is displayed on scan tool.
Be sure to turn ignition switch to OFF position for 120 seconds in order to clear current DTC.

s1.ptxt: Connect SUZUKI scan tool to data link connector in the same manner as when making this connection for DTC check.
Turn ignition switch OFF and then ON (but engine at stop).
Clear DTC according to instructions displayed on scan tool. Refer to scan tool operator’s manual for further details.
Turn ignition switch OFF for 120 seconds.
